channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Creators and communities everywhere take a stand against ICE
item.description: It's not surprising when the guy who's been yelling about the horrors of late-stage capitalism on Instagram for the last five years turns his ire towards ICE. But something different has been happening over the week or so, following the most recent shootings of civilians by federal agents - even accounts that stay laser focused […]

item.title: TechCrunch Mobility: RIP, Tesla Autopilot, and the NTSB investigates Waymo
item.description: Welcome back to TechCrunch Mobility — your central hub for news and insights on the future of transportation.

item.title: It doesn’t matter if Alex Pretti had a gun
item.description: Shortly after federal agents killed Alex Pretti Saturday morning, DHS began to run with the story that the dead man had been armed and dangerous. He had a gun, DHS said. (A Bellingcat analysis of the video concludes that Pretti was unarmed when he was shot.) He had approached the agents holding the gun, DHS […]

item.title: Ils l’ont retrouvée : la matière manquante de l’Univers refait surface après 30 ans de mystère
item.description: Les astronomes la cherchaient depuis longtemps. Récemment, ils en avaient retrouvé la trace. Et voici qu’ils sont enfin parvenus à mettre la main dessus : la matière ordinaire manquante de notre Univers. Le tout grâce à un mystérieux indic.

item.title: Honor Magic 8 Lite vs Xiaomi Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G : comment choisir le meilleur téléphone milieu de gamme ?
item.description: Ce sont les deux smartphones de milieu de gamme les plus enthousiasmants de ce début d'année : comment faire pour bien choisir entre le Honor Magic 8 Lite et Xiaomi Redmi Note 15 Pro 5G ?

item.title: Apple will reportedly unveil its Gemini-powered Siri assistant in February
item.description: We’re about to get our first real look at the results of the recently announced AI partnership between Apple and Google.

item.title: Ce récent balai aspirateur d’une puissance de 25 000 Pa lave à la mousse et perd 70 € pendant les soldes
item.description: Le Roborock F25 Ace Pro débarque avec ses 25 000 Pa de puissance et sa technologie de nettoyage par mousse, une approche encore rare sur le marché. Durant les soldes, le tarif glisse de 649 euros à 579 euros chez Boulanger.

item.title: ‘Dragon Ball Super’ Is Back, and It’s Going Galactic
item.description: The 'Dragon Ball' anime is turning 40, and its future involves a return to 'Super' and a brand new Bandai Namco game.

item.title: What is Bending Spoons? Everything to know about Eventbrite’s acquirer
item.description: Bending Spoons remains largely unknown, even as its portfolio of products has served more than a billion people.

item.title: Google says it’s fixed Gmail issues with spam and misclassification
item.description: If your Gmail account doesn’t seem to be working properly today, you’re not alone.

item.title: Trusting your phone to Abxylute’s mobile controller requires a big leap of faith
item.description: As a retro gaming fan, I was thrilled when Apple opened its App Store to emulators in 2024, but I've yet to find a controller that makes me want to fully embrace retro gaming on my phone. Clamp-on controllers like the Backbone Pro are a bit too bulky, and I don't want to prop my […]

item.title: Sophie Adenot : le parcours hors norme de la future astronaute française
item.description: Prochaine Française à partir dans l'espace dans le cadre d'une mission prévue vers la Station spatiale internationale (ISS) en février 2026, Sophie Adenot est ingénieure, militaire, pilote d'hélicoptère et sportive aguerrie. Et bien plus que ça encore.

item.title: Yoshi and Birdo arrive in new trailer for The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, along with an earlier release date
item.description: There's a new trailer for the upcoming Super Mario movie, The Super Mario Galaxy Movie, and it confirms some beloved characters are joining the crew for its latest adventure. The trailer provides our first official look at Yoshi in the new movie, whose appearance was leaked back in the fall by a Pillsbury cookie box design. And, just as exciting, we also see Birdo in the mix. The trailer was released during Nintendo's The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Direct.The short event also confirmed that the movie is now in post-production. While a previous trailer set the release date at April 3, the movie i...

item.title: Confidence class gets derailed in SNL sketch
item.description: Confidence class gets derailed in 'SNL' sketch

item.title: Having spam and filtering issues in Gmail? You're not alone – and Google is rolling out a fix
item.description: A variety of bugs have been afflicting Gmail inboxes over the course of the weekend, but Google seems to be on top of it.
